'''Notes'''
Great high performance laptop for Linux. To have Wi-fi and full 3D acceleration you need Ubuntu restricted drivers. Remember that just like other Pavilion laptops this one also suffers overheating problem. Setting fan on full speed (cut off third yellow fan cable) and removing HP Expansion Port 3 can fix this problem. All hardware buttons work fine. Haven't tested finger print sensor. Having two 160GB HDD by default has caused some little problems at installation.
